sources.title: The Constant Woman
sources.description: A drama based on a play by Eugene O'Neill and starring Conrad Nagel and Leila Hyams. Arthur Housman plays a drunk, as usual. Currently rated 7.0 at IMDb.

metadata.Plot: After the death of his wife, and discovering their son is not really his, Walt turns to alcohol until he finds a new love.
metadata.Writer: Eugene O'Neill, Warren Duff, F. Hugh Herbert
metadata.Actors: Conrad Nagel, Leila Hyams, Tommy Conlon
